activities: The information received from UATP's Members is used solely for the purpose of processing transactions between Members.  UATP also uses personal information received in connection with registrations to its Annual Distribution conference for the purpose of registering conference attendees and sending conference materials to those attendees.  Finally, UATP has employees located in the EU, and employee information is transferred in connection with employment of those individuals
eucountries: France, Germany, Ireland, Switzerland, United Kingdom
